nodes.bodyText: that SingletonList isn't here hurts my brain because it is a well known type. that said I understand why you are doing this.. it is under the assumption nothing else is using this method which is fair enough. It might hurt brain less to say intentionally not checking SingletonList due as the only call site wont' have it
Good call, added a comment both for that and because I realized the empty list check was similarly redundant.
